data.oai_dc:dc: MBNMS/PISCO: Physical Oceanography: moored temperature data: Weston Beach, California, USA (WES001)

This metadata record describes moored seawater temperature data collected at Weston Beach, California, USA, by PISCO. Measurements were collected using a StowAway Tidbit Temperature Logger (Onset Computer Corp. TBI32-05+37) beginning 2009-10-22. The instrument depth was 021 meters, in an overall water depth of 30 meters (both relative to Mean Sea Level, MSL). The sampling interval was 4.0 minutes.
